title: Found A bug in ARAM concerning the new summoner spell 'Mark'
body: I was playing a game of ARAM the other day and was using the new summoner spell 'Mark' when I reactivated it after shooting it i ended up flying from the middle of the map into the enemy spawn resulting in me getting killed by the person that was in spawn even though the person that i hit with the mark was standing in the tower near the middle of the map... Then today i watched it happen to a Leblanc on the enemy team this needs to be fixed asap.

replies.body:
>Then today i watched it happen to a Leblanc

There *was* a bug with Leblanc which caused her dash to never stop, causing her to go indefinitely towards the end of the map. Just saying it could have been that one.

Also,

>**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
